newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash bug caused when EVEMon doesn't find implants previously used. * Fixed a potential crash bug caused when EVEMon doesn't find implants from the API. * Fixed a bug where plans where not exported in a correct format. * Fixed a crash bag when selecting to show a skill in skill browser. * Fixed a crash bug when EVEMon doesn't find the produced item from an industry job. * Fixed a visual bug where in rare cases the tray tooltip was not shown on top of all windows. * Fixed a memory leak and crash bug in EVE Mail monitor. * Fixed a bug when trying to add a skill level to a plan from a character's skill list or skill queue.
== Enhancements ==
* Exporting in HTML, TXT format have been brought in line with EVE changes. * Improved the handling of the Skill Planner skill selector. * Added a close window function for the Blank Character Creator. * Added prefix settings for various Email provider in EVEMon Emailer. * All password will now be stored encrypted in settings file, thus increasing user data security. * Redesigned the EFT Loadout Importation window and added support for XMl and DNA formatted loadouts.
== Misc ==
* Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better and more stable application.
